languages.text: "Кровавая весталка — суровая воительница, что чтит Всеотца, пусть и по-своему. Но на Фенрисе есть обычаи и посуровее, так что не страшись ее".
"This blood scryer is a fierce warrior who honours the Allfather in her own way. There are much harsher customs on Fenris than this, so you need not be afraid of her."
languages.original_text: "Кровавая весталка — суровая воительница, что чтит Всеотца, пусть и по-своему. Но на Фенрисе есть обычаи и посуровее, так что не страшись ее".

traits.locale_text: "The bloody vestal is a fierce warrior who honours the Allfather in her own way. There are much harsher customs of Fenris, so you need not be afraid of her."
"The bloody vestal is a fierce warrior who honours the Allfather in her own way. There are much harsher customs of Fenris, so you need not be afraid of her."

"This blood scryer is a fierce warrior who honours the Allfather in her own way. There are much harsher customs on Fenris than this, so you need not be afraid of her."

languages.text: «Esta vidente de la sangre es una feroz guerrera que honra al Padre de Todo a su manera. Hay costumbres en Fenris mucho más salvajes que esta; no hay necesidad de temerla».
languages.original_text: "This blood scryer is a fierce warrior who honours the Allfather in her own way. There are much harsher customs on Fenris than this, so you need not be afraid of her."

traits.locale_text: «Esta vidente de la sangre es una feroz guerrera que honra al Padre de Todo a su manera. Hay costumbres en Fenris mucho más salvajes que esta; no hay necesidad de temerla».

languages.text: 「この血の叫びは、彼女なりに全知の父を敬う獰猛な戦士だ。フェンリスには更に厳しい習慣があるから、彼女を恐れる必要はない」
languages.original_text: "This blood scryer is a fierce warrior who honours the Allfather in her own way. There are much harsher customs on Fenris than this, so you need not be afraid of her."

traits.locale_text: 「この血の叫びは、彼女なりに全知の父を敬う獰猛な戦士だ。フェンリスには更に厳しい習慣があるから、彼女を恐れる必要はない」

languages.text: “鲜血的占卜师是位骁勇善战的战士，她以她自己的方式向全父致敬。芬里斯有很多习俗比这还要严酷得多，所以你不必惧怕她。”
languages.original_text: "This blood scryer is a fierce warrior who honours the Allfather in her own way. There are much harsher customs on Fenris than this, so you need not be afraid of her."

traits.locale_text: “鲜血的占卜师是位骁勇善战的战士，她以她自己的方式向全父致敬。芬里斯有很多习俗比这还要严酷得多，所以你不必惧怕她。”

languages.text: "Diese Blutseherin ist eine wilde Kriegerin, die den Allvater auf ihre eigene Art ehrt. Es gibt weitaus härtere Bräuche auf Fenris als diesen, Ihr müsst also keine Angst vor ihr haben."
languages.original_text: "This blood scryer is a fierce warrior who honours the Allfather in her own way. There are much harsher customs on Fenris than this, so you need not be afraid of her."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Blutseherin ist eine wilde Kriegerin, die den Allvater auf ihre eigene Art ehrt. Es gibt weitaus härtere Bräuche auf Fenris als diesen, Ihr müsst also keine Angst vor ihr haben."

languages.text: « Cette augure de sang est une féroce guerrière qui honore le Père de Tous à sa manière. Il existe sur Fenris des coutumes bien plus effroyables que celle-ci, vous n'avez rien à craindre de sa part. »
languages.original_text: "This blood scryer is a fierce warrior who honours the Allfather in her own way. There are much harsher customs on Fenris than this, so you need not be afraid of her."

traits.locale_text: « Cette augure de sang est une féroce guerrière qui honore le Père de Tous à sa manière. Il existe sur Fenris des coutumes bien plus effroyables que celle-ci, vous n'avez rien à craindre de sa part. »

languages.text: "Bu kan kâhini, kendi yöntemleriyle Yücebaba'yı onurlandıran hiddetli bir savaşçı. Fenris'te bundan daha acımasız gelenekler vardır. O yüzden ondan korkmana gerek yok."
languages.original_text: "This blood scryer is a fierce warrior who honours the Allfather in her own way. There are much harsher customs on Fenris than this, so you need not be afraid of her."
